name: e.surv Chartered Surveyors
overview: e.surv Chartered Surveyors, a subsidiary of LSL Property Services PLC Group of companiesis an expert in real estate valuation in the UK. Its voyage started in 1987 when it was a part of General Accident and separated from the entity in the year of 1999. From being knownas GA Valuations, it rebrandedto be known as e.survchartered surveyors. It was in the year of 2004 thate.survand its sister company parted ways from Norwich Unionleading to the formation of LSL Property Services PLC. LSL Property Services PLC has been on an expansion mode since then embarking upon a number of acquisitions including Reeds Rain Estate Agency, St Trinity Asset Management (formerly Halifax Corporate Services),Homefast Property Lawyers, etc. The unprecedented growth that it witnessed paved way for its listing in the Stock exchange in the year of 2006 in a £220m floatation. With a team of skilled professionals, it provides guidance driven by extensive researches. It has endeavoredto understand the requirements and likes of the clients and designservices keeping in mind the importance and the attachmentof the property to clients. It also took the plunge to introduce online residential valuation services that gained ground and is highly preferred at present. We deal with lenders, intermediaries, social housing entities, estate agents and other private customers. Its monthly releases delve into the property trends in the UK and give you an insight on mortgage lending. We are competent enough to complete one valuation in every four minutes. Our cost effective services have further enabledus to win the trust and goodwill of our consumers. TheMortgage Strategy Awards chose as the Valuer/Surveyor of the year in 2010. Our 25 years expertise in this field has enabled us to bolster our growth irrespective of the difficulties in the UK Property market.

milestones.description: In 2010 e.surv was voted the Valuer / Surveyor of the Year at the Mortgage Strategy Awards
